parameter-group.name: openhab
parameter-group.label: openHAB
parameter-group.description: The Z-Way server requires this information to notify the openHAB server. If Z-Way and openHAB are running on the same machine, the default value can be used.

parameter-group.name: zwayServer
parameter-group.label: Z-Way server
parameter-group.description: The configuration of the Z-Way server. Except for the username and password all the information detected during the discovery.

parameter-group.name: binding
parameter-group.label: Options
parameter-group.description: These settings affect functions of the binding.

parameter.name: openHABAlias
parameter.label: Alias
parameter.description: Alias used in openHAB connector. By default, the alias is generated.

parameter.name: openHABIpAddress
parameter.label: IP address
parameter.description: The IP address or hostname of the openHAB server. If Z-Way and openHAB are running on the same machine, the default value can be used.

parameter.name: openHABPort
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The port of the openHAB server.

parameter.name: openHABProtocol
parameter.label: Protocol
parameter.description: Protocol to connect to the openHAB server (http or https).

parameter.name: zwayServerIpAddress
parameter.label: IP address
parameter.description: The IP address or hostname of the Z-Way server. If Z-Way and openHAB are running on the same machine, the default value can be used.

parameter.name: zwayServerPort
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: The port of the Z-Way server

parameter.name: zwayServerProtocol
parameter.label: Protocol
parameter.description: Protocol to connect to the Z-Way server (http or https)

parameter.name: zwayServerUsername
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Username to access the Z-Way server.

parameter.name: zwayServerPassword
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password to access the Z-Way server.

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Refresh device states and registration from Z-Way server.

parameter.name: observerMechanismEnabled
parameter.label: Observer mechanism enabled
parameter.description: The observer functionality is responsible for the item registration as observer in Z-Way. Attention: if disable this option, you have to setup an other synchronization mechanism like MQTT.
